SELECT NOTICE_NO, /* 공지사항 번호 */ NOTICE_TITLE, /* 공지사항 제목 */ NOTICE_CONTENT, /* 공지사항 내용 */ (SELECT NICKNAME FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE WRITER_NO = MEM_NO) AS WRITER, /* 작성자명 */ TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as CREATE_DATE, /* 공지사항 등록일 */ STATUS, /* 공지사항 상태(=노출여부) */ VIEW_COUNT /* 공지사항 조회수 */ FROM TB_NOTICE
WHERE 1=1 /* AND STATUS = 'Y' */ ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, WRITER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ?, 1 -- 작성자 회원번호(수정필요) )

SELECT NOTICE_NO, /* 공지사항 번호 */ NOTICE_TITLE, /* 공지사항 제목 */ NOTICE_CONTENT, /* 공지사항 내용 */ STATUS, /* 공지사항 게시여부 */ TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS CREATE_DATE, /* 공지사항 등록일 */ (SELECT NICKNAME FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE WRITER_NO = MEM_NO) AS WRITER /* 작성자명 */ FROM TB_NOTICE
WHERE 1=1 AND NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET VIEW_COUNT = (VIEW_COUNT + 1) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ?, NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
